name: the Melancholic Flower
description:
A game made for the game pratique at Montpellier(France) in 48h.

Our subject was to promove the Occitanie region, more precisely the academy of Floral games (at Toulouse in France). 

This academy rewards poets with trophies in the shape of flowers.
We thought to take inspiration from the language of flowers to think of various powers.

The player must recover these flowers to win the game.
But because of the 48 hours, there is a condensed level of all the powers.

We invite you to discover the  game .
